basis for you providing personal information and special categories of personal information  partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal information and special categories of personal information, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys).
